page.description: Decodes text that has been urlencoded.
page.syntax: Output_String as C = URLDECODE(url as c)

argument.name: url
argument.description: An encoded URL address produced by URLENCODE() or similar function.

page.discussion: URLDECODE() decodes text that has been urlencoded. The function creates a character string by replacing the escape characters in the Encoded_URL_String with their normal ASCII equivalents.
page.example:
? urldecode("text%2dvalue%3dfoo%20bar%3b") = "text-value=foo bar;"
? urldecode("text%2Dvalue%3Dfoo%20bar%3B") = "text-value=foo bar;"
? urldecode("text%2dvalue%3dfoo bar%3b") = "text-value=foo bar;"
? urldecode("text-value%3dfoo%20bar%3b") = "text-value=foo bar;"
? urldecode("text-value%3Dfoo bar%3B") = "text-value=foo bar;"
